reviews.review_msg: Dr. Park is an amazing professor, truly wants to see his students succeed. Exams, midterms, quizzes were fair. If you put in the effort you will be rewarded in this class.

He is an amazing professor and teaches very well. Be sure to solve all the homework questions he gives. The quizzes,midterms and final are all very similar to the homework questions. He is accessible outside the class and genuinely cares about his students.

Professor Park goes the extra mile by telling students what to study for his exams and giving them similar practice material, something that seems to be uncommon among university professors. Hansol genuinely cares about his students, and in response he gains a lot of respect from those who take his class.

Lectures were good, not great but good. Quizzes were easy, as long as you do even a little homework you should be fine. Midterms were fair and the Final was based heavily off the 2 midterms. Responds to emails well.

This has been one of my favourite courses I have taken thanks to Hansol Park. The exams and quizzes were extremely fair and allowed me to show my knowledge of the course. The lecture slides were organized and easy to follow and he explained concepts very well while also doing example questions related to our homework. I would highly recommend!

Easy quizzes created for learning and fair grading schemes for tests. Often accessible for questions. Not 5/5 as it is not recommended to attend lectures; JM's videos are far more professional and well-paced. HP also swiftly accommodated for my disability in regards to tests. Heavily recommended if you are okay with JM videos to use for learning.
Took Hansol for Summer 2022 Semester, He is a great professor for MATH 252. His quizzes are easy and had clear grading criteria.

Half these reviews are lies! Barely anyone attends the lectures!

Quizzes are very fair. If you put in any effort at all, you absolutely cannot fail this class.
Hansol Park is very knowledgeable and explains the material well. His midterms and quizzes are fair, and he cares about his students. Great prof.

As a new professor, Hansol Park definitely took his time getting the feel and having a good understanding of assessments. His quizzes and midterms were extremely fair and oftentimes marked leniently, allowing for minor arithmetic errors not to completely ruin your grade. Would take again, 10/10

Overall, a good professor, especially since I believe this was his first class.
Sometimes he speaks too fast or goes through examples too quickly but this is the only criticism I have.
The examination material followed from the class material, the midterms proved to be of reasonable difficulty, and he was approachable when I had questions.

Hansol is a caring professor and usually has decent lecture slides. He is a bit difficult to understand because of his accent and fast talking speed. Sometimes he skips over examples or moves too quickly, but it's manageable. Easy quizzes and fair exams.

First time teaching at SFU. Fantastic professor. Clear grading criteria, fair tests, easy quizzes. Nothing abstract. As others mentioned we had Jamie's lectures but his lectures were also very useful and helpful. Overall awesome professor.

This was his first semester was his first, and I think he did a really good job. Quizzes were simple, no curveballs, and although there are Jamie's lectures online, I feel that Hansol had lectures that were as good, and explained concepts well.
